shortDescription: Building core features for an agricultural supply-chain platform where data correctness and reliability are non-negotiable. Work across backend systems, financial calculations, analytics, and complex data-driven UIs. Focused on improving operational trust by solving issues around consistency, synchronization, and scale.

Worked across Python, AWS, and React on production systems. Over time, took ownership of backend architecture, led small teams, mentored juniors, and focused on reliability, testing, and documentation.
